name: Oscuro
description:
Oscuro is a serious game for everybody that brings more than entertainment. It works with the structure of the person's thinking and how he/she perceives the world, seeking to generate new thoughts from this perception, helping overcome nyctophobia (fear of the dark).

It's a first-person adventure that takes you to explore situations and places under difficult lighting conditions. You'll have some fun with some challenges, discover elements and overcome quests to help a magical friend (Mousey) illuminate the place you'll be visiting and get the three keys you need to get out of the game. 

Through activities created specifically to have fun in the dark, you can change your perception of it!

Disclaimer: This game is not a substitute for therapy that a professional psychologistcan provide you with.
